capabilities.read: (edit_upload_and_index AND edit_tcp_stream) OR edit_monitor OR edit_tcp OR edit_udp OR edit_scripted OR (edit_token_http OR dmc_deploy_token_http) OR edit_deployment_server OR edit_win_wmiconf OR edit_win_regmon OR edit_win_eventlogs OR edit_modinput_admon OR edit_modinput_perfmon OR edit_modinput_winhostmon OR edit_modinput_winnetmon OR edit_modinput_winprintmon OR admin_all_objects
